MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the TD9 postcode area of Hawick. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.04am due to a broken overhead line near to Whitehaugh and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.24am on Wednesday, 07 April 2021.
